## hpr0044 :: My desktop, and the apps I use everyday

 blosxom;
emelfm2;
openssh;
sshfs;
fuse;
fish protocol;
stormsiren;
fluxbox;
nuevat3k-glacier fluxbox theme;
screen;
gkrellm;
gkrellkam;
firefox;
tab mix plus;
google notebook;
konqueror;
vim;
listgarden;
audacity;
easytag;
music player daemon;
gftp; and
xchat.
